name: South Woods
summary: Boston Chops Downtown is a casual, yet refined twist on the classic American steakhouse. Impeccable service and top quality nose-to-tail dining combine in a modern, urban atmosphere.

name: North Woods
summary: Upscale French- & Italian-inspired dishes & European wines served in an elegant townhouse space.
